text: A true patriot and visionary! Dr. Elizabeth Cressman's $20 million gift to Norton Healthcare's "Just Imagine" campaign is a testament to her unwavering commitment to improving the lives of Parkinson's patients. Her generosity will not only expand critical care programs but also drive vital research forward. May her legacy inspire us all to support causes that uplift our communities and preserve our nation's greatness. #AmericaFirst #HealthcareHeroes ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸
